Name.BusinessNameLine1: Pensacola Area Chamber of Commerce Inc

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: Promote economic development in the Pensacola Area.
IRS990.MissionDescription: Be a catalyst of positive and creative action in the pursuit of excellence for the Pensacola Bay Area business community.
IRS990.Description: Tourism administration & convention committee - to promote tourism in Escambia County.

Activity2.Description: Economic Development - to encourage and assist expansion of local industry and to promote economic development.

Activity3.Description: Military development - promote the Escambia County area as a viable economic area for military operations.

OtherAssets.Description: Due from Pensacola Area Chamber Foundation

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrant: Maritime Domain Awareness/TWIC, IED prevention, protection, response, and recovery capabilities, training and exercises, management and administration

Form990ScheduleLPartIV.DescriptionOfTransaction: Organization has bank account at Board Member's bank
Organization holds events at Board Member's hotel
Organization ran add in Board Member's newspaper
Board Member's college provides space for incubator project
Organization purchases newspaper Board Member publishes
Board Member's university provides space for Workforce Summit and HAAS center research

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: All persons, firms and corporations interested in the development of the Pensacola area are eligble for membership. Each applicant has to be approved by the Board of Directors.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The 990 is presented to the Board for approval once the return is received from the CPA firm.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Officers and directors annually sign a conflict of interest form where they disclose their business conflicts. The organization's staff monitors any votes that may pose a conflict and ensure appropriate members abstain from voting.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The organization uses salary data from ACCE, IEDC and DMO to determine salary ranges. The amounts are re-evaluated every two years.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 18
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The organization's 990 is available upon request.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The organization's governing documents, conflict of interest policy and financial statements are available upon request.
The Board of Directors assumes responsibility for oversight of the audit.

Form990ScheduleRPartI.PrimaryActivities: Enable NAS Pensacola tenant commands to collaborate large sums of data

Form990ScheduleRPartI.PrimaryActivities: Facilitate secure data exchange of healthcare information

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: Raise funds to support and promote Strategic Health Intelligence initiative
